articles.author: Evan Bush
articles.title: Bogong moths appear to use stars to navigate 600-mile journey, a first for insects - NBC News
articles.description: Each spring, billions of bogong moths fill southeast Australia’s skies.
articles.content: The bogong moth, as far as we know, is the first one that has been described to navigate using the stars, said Andrea Adden, a postdoctoral researcher who studies at The Francis Crick Institute in Lo… [+3550 chars]
